name: BusybeeAutomation
0:
”Alexa, change the temperature to 75!”
”Alexa, lock the door!”
”Alexa, turn the front light off!”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Busybee Automation Smart Devices are compatible with Alexa to provide hands-free voice command options. Have convenient control by using Alexa as your smart apartment assistant! 
Using this Skill requires a Busybee Resident account and residency in a Busybee Smart Apartment Property. Control your Smart Thermostats, Smart Lighting, and Keyless entry with your voice! Your Busybee Smart Automated Technology devices in your apartment home are already configured to your Busybee Automation resident account, so once you activate this Skill, you will be able to start controlling your Busybee Automation Smart Devices immediately!
Your life just got a little easier! Busybee Smart Automated Technology and Alexa. Convenience. On Demand. Satisfaction. Luxury Living.
